snippet: A federal judge said Tuesday that the government must notify Occupy DC protesters if it intends to evict them from a Washington park and remove their belongings.
abstract: Federal Judge James E Boasberg says the government must notify Occupy DC protesters if it intends to evict them from a Washington park and remove their belongings.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge said Tuesday that the government must notify Occupy DC protesters if it intends to evict them from a Washington park and remove their belongings.

headline.main: Judge Says Notice Must Be Given for Park Evictions
headline.print_headline: Judge Says Notice Must Be Given For Park Evictions
